heading: We’ll miss you!
body:
By subscribing to GetUp emails, you are at the forefront of a people powered movement that fights for a fair, flourishing and just Australia. Together we can make extraordinary impact on issues from human rights and climate action through to economic fairness and First Nations Justice.

By unsubscribing, you’ll miss out on campaign updates and announcements, as well as the chance to be part of changing politics for the better through the GetUp movement.

If you do want to unsubscribe from all our emails, just enter your email address below and click “Unsubscribe”. We’ll miss you if you go, but you can come back anytime by signing up at [www.getup.org.au](https://www.getup.org.au).
